rules_text:
When Fervid Curator enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, promote Fervid Curator. [i](Put a loyalty counter on it. Then if it has three or more loyalty counters on it, transform it.)[/i]
special_text2:
Flying, first strike, trample
[-1]: Brilliant Conqueror deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
[-1]: Attach target Equipment you control to Brilliant Conqueror.
